create table checkout_temp_${order_member_id} as select member.seq as order_member_seq, member.id as order_member_id, goods.image as order_goods_image, goods.name as order_goods_name, goods.price as order_goods_price, goods.amount as order_goods_amount from member, goods where member.seq = (select seq from member where id ='${order_member_id}') and goods.seq=${order_goods_num}
